mapper.insert: insert into product_photos(product_photo, origin_file_name, upload_file_name) values(#{productPhoto}, #{originFileName}, #{uploadFileName})
mapper.update: update product_photos set product_photo = #{productPhoto}, origin_file_name = #{originFileName}, upload_file_name = #{uploadFileName} where product_id = #{productId}
mapper.delete: delete from product_photos where product_id = #{productId} and product_photo = #{productPhoto}
